dublinCore.dc:title: 115 HR 1238 EAS:
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

engrossed-amendment-form.current-chamber: In the Senate of the United States,

section.text: That the bill from the House of Representatives (H.R. 1238) entitled An Act to amend the Homeland Security Act of 2002 to make the Assistant Secretary of Homeland Security for Health Affairs responsible for coordinating the efforts of the Department of Homeland Security related to food, agriculture, and veterinary defense against terrorism, and for other purposes., do pass with the following

amendment-instruction.text: On page 4, lines 1 and 2, strike relating to food and agriculture and insert or the Secretary of Health and Human Services.
On page 4, strike line 3 and all that follows through the end of the matter following line 6 and insert the following:

subsection.text: The table of contents in section 1(b) of the Homeland Security Act of 2002 is amendedâ€”

paragraph.text: by striking the items relating to sections 523, 524, 525, 526, and 527; and
by inserting after the item relating to section 522 the following:

toc.toc-entry: Sec. 524. Voluntary private sector preparedness accreditation and certification program.
Sec. 526. Integrated public alert and warning system modernization.
Sec. 528. Coordination of Department of Homeland Security efforts related to food, agriculture, and veterinary defense against terrorism.
